flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This is mainly for people who jailbroke their iPhone and want to put it back to normal.
guide.introduction_rendered: This is mainly for people who jailbroke their iPhone and want to put it back to normal.

lines.text: First go to Cydia and delete all of the packages you downloaded from Cydia.
lines.text_raw: First go to Cydia and delete all of the packages you downloaded from Cydia.

lines.text: Then go to your packages on Cydia and find "Cydia installer" and tap on it and click "Remove" in the right-hand corner. Don't forget to do the forced removal; it isn't dangerous.
lines.text_raw: Then go to your packages on Cydia and find "Cydia installer" and tap on it and click "Remove" in the right-hand corner. Don't forget to do the forced removal; it isn't dangerous.

lines.text: Then go into your settings app and click "General" then scroll to the bottom of the page and click "Reset" and click "Reset all settings".
lines.text_raw: Then go into your settings app and click "General" then scroll to the bottom of the page and click "Reset" and click "Reset all settings".

lines.text: Finally plug your iPhone into iTunes and it will sync instead of restore.
lines.text_raw: Finally plug your iPhone into iTunes and it will sync instead of restore.

guide.summary: This will show you how to reverse a jailbreak without ssh or a restore.
guide.title: Reverse-Jailbreak Your iPhone or iPod Touch Without a Restore
